title: A protein's surprising role offers clues to limit graft-vs.-host disease

title_detail.value: A protein's surprising role offers clues to limit graft-vs.-host disease

summary: In a surprising finding, researchers showed the protein NLRP6 aggravated the difficult symptoms of gastrointestinal graft-vs.-host disease. Knocking out this protein in mice led to significantly better survival and less severe GVHD.

summary_detail.value: In a surprising finding, researchers showed the protein NLRP6 aggravated the difficult symptoms of gastrointestinal graft-vs.-host disease. Knocking out this protein in mice led to significantly better survival and less severe GVHD.
